doc:
Robert Boon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Boon 0 Robert Boon (October 26, 1916 – January 13, 2015) was a Dutch-born American film, television, and theater actor. His film credits included The Tanks Are Coming in 1951 and Queen of Blood in 1966. Boon's television credits included on The Twilight Zone episodes "Deaths-Head Revisited" in 1961 and "Mute" in 1963. Robert_Boon ( October_26_,_1916 – January_13_,_2015 ) was a_Dutch-born_American_film , television , and theater_actor . His_film_credits included The_Tanks Are_Coming in 1951 and Queen of Blood in 1966 . Boon 's_television_credits included on The_Twilight_Zone_episodes " Deaths-Head_Revisited " in 1961 and "_Mute_" in 1963 .
